# TRIQ analysis

```{r, triq}
# Load TRIQ analysis
parent_path <- dirname(solPath)
sol_name <- basename(solPath)
experiment_name <- unlist(strsplit(sol_name, "\\."))[1]
filename <- paste(experiment_name,"_triq.csv",sep="")
filepath <- paste(parent_path,filename,sep="/")
triq <- read.csv(filepath, sep = ";" , header = TRUE )[-c(7:10)]
triq[is.na(triq)] <- ""
# Print table
knitr::kable(triq)
```

# Graphical analysis

```{r, graphs,fig.width = 5, fig.height=8, fig.align='center'}

# Build pattern graphs
patternGraphs <- buildExperimentPatternGraphs(experiment,
  value_tag = "consumption",
  layer_tag = "year",
  instance_tag = "time slot",
  ial_title = "",
  ila_title = "",
  lia_title = "")

i <- 1
for (sol_gr in patternGraphs){
  cat(paste0("\n## Solution " , i, "\n\n"))
  cat(paste0("### [Solution ",i,"] Monthly consumption series for each year\n\n"))
  print(sol_gr$ial)
  cat("\n\n")
  cat(paste0("### [Solution ",i,"] Yearly consumption series for each month\n\n"))
  print(sol_gr$ila)
  cat("\n\n")
  cat(paste0("### [Solution ",i,"] Annual consumption for each month\n\n"))
  print(sol_gr$lia)
  i <- i+1
}
```
